• Introducing Padlet Nearby, a new way to share padlets with the people around you! Padlet Nearby allows you to broadcast padlet(s) to any number of devices around you via bluetooth for a quicker and more seamless way to collaborate.

To use this feature, go to any padlet and click the three horizontal dots in the top right corner. Then in the popup menu, select broadcast, which will broadcast the padlet to nearby devices for an hour. You can also cancel this at any time by following the same procedure.

To access nearby padlets, click the "Join a padlet" button on the dashboard, and a list of shared padlets will appear there! You can also access this as guest, by clicking "Continue as guest" on the welcome screen.

• Introducing Padlet Nearby, a new way to share padlets with the people around you! Padlet Nearby allows you to broadcast padlet(s) to any number of devices around you via bluetooth for a quicker and more seamless way to collaborate.

To use this feature, go to any padlet and click the three horizontal dots in the top right corner. Then in the popup menu, select broadcast, which will broadcast the padlet to nearby devices for an hour. You can also cancel this at any time by following the same procedure.

To access nearby padlets, click the "Join a padlet" button on the dashboard, and a list of shared padlets will appear there! You can also access this as guest, by clicking "Continue as guest" on the welcome screen.

• Introducing Padlet Nearby, a new way to share padlets with the people around you! Padlet Nearby allows you to broadcast padlet(s) to any number of devices around you via bluetooth for a quicker and more seamless way to collaborate.

To use this feature, go to any padlet and click the three horizontal dots in the top right corner. Then in the popup menu, select broadcast, which will broadcast the padlet to nearby devices for an hour. You can also cancel this at any time by following the same procedure.

To access nearby padlets, click the "Join a padlet" button on the dashboard, and a list of shared padlets will appear there! You can also access this as guest, by clicking "Continue as guest" on the welcome screen.

• Introducing spotlight search! Now your padlets can be search from your phones search menu.
• More padlet settings options phone in your phones menu, now allow you to disable broadcast.
• Numerous bug fixes an improvements, including fixes to the new share extension and a bug causing the upload custom wallpaper to crash.

• Introducing spotlight search! Now your padlets can be search from your phones search menu.
• More padlet settings options phone in your phones menu, now allow you to disable broadcast.
• Numerous bug fixes an improvements, including fixes to the new share extension and a bug causing the upload custom wallpaper to crash.

• Introducing spotlight search! Now your padlets can be search from your phones search menu.
